snippet: Seth Numrich will portray the "Golden Boy" protagonist Joe Bonaparte, a young man torn between careers as a violinist and a boxer, alongside an ensemble cast that includes Tony Shalhoub (of TV's "Monk" and Broadway's "Lend Me a Tenor") and Danny...
abstract: Seth Numrich will portray the "Golden Boy" protagonist Joe Bonaparte, a young man torn between careers as a violinist and a boxer, alongside an ensemble cast that includes Tony Shalhoub (of TV's "Monk" and Broadway's "Lend Me a Tenor") and Danny Burstein (a recent Tony Award nominee for "Follies").

headline.main: 'Golden Boy' Cast Features Tony Shalhoub, Yvonne Strahovski and Danny Burstein
